title: Кровавая барыня
overview: Daria Saltykova, the infamous duchess turned serial killer, is brought to life in this epic new series. After the death of her wealthy husband, she inherited his fortune and became a hostage to fits of rage. She brutally beat her own servants for the slightest fault. She is responsible for the murder of approximately 75 people, earning her the title of Russia's first serial killer.
